title: [PPKLP] Late Night Tales By Matt Helders From Arctic Monkeys
description:
Artist:    Various Artists
Album:     Late Night Tales by Matt Helders From Arctic Monkeys
Release:    2008-11-11
Quality:    MP3/VBR

Tracklist: 
01. Goblin - Connexion
02. Victor Vaughn - Vaudeville Villain
03. Yamusuki - Yama Yama
04. Zeph & Apheem - Play the Drum
05. DJ Format - Charity Shop Soundclash
06. Little Barrie - Free Salute
07. The Black Keys - Thickfreakness
08. Matt Helders featuring Nesreen Shah - Dreamer
09. The Stooges - Dirt
10. Johnny and the Hurricanes - Sheba
11. Modeselektor featuring Puppetmastaz - The Dark Side of the Sun
12. Mos Def - Ms Fat Booty
13. Da Luniz - I Got 5 on It
14. The Coral - Grey Harpoon
15. Minnie Riperton - Reasons
16. Roots Manuva - Dreamy Days
17. Ty - Break the Lock
18. Simian Mobile Disco - I Believe
19. The Rapture - Olio
20. Alex Turner - A Choice of Three

This newest Late Night Tales instalment is curated by Matt Helders, clothing designer, burgeoning remixer and, somewhat more famously, drummer of Arctic Monkeys. In addition to the track selections from other artists (more on those later) there are two Arctic Monkeys-related exclusives on the disc too: Helders teams up with a couple of mates for a straight-faced cover of 'Dreamer' by Livin' Joy, while at the end of the album Alex Turner shows up, reading the story 'A Choice Of Three'. Helders' picks for his playlist are impressively
diverse, starting off with Goblin's 'Connexion' only to continue with Viktor Vaughn's 'Vaudeville Villain' and Yamasuki's J-rock ditty 'Yama Yama'. That's a pretty decent triple whammy. Hip hop transpires to be something of a theme, with contributions from DJ Format, Zeph & Azeem, Mos Def, Luniz ('I Got 5 On It') and Roots Manuva to name but a few. In amongst all those you'll also encounter tracks by The Stooges, Johnny & The Hurricanes, Simian Mobile Disco, The Rapture and even Modeselektor, making for an eclectic though not undiscerning mix.

Enloy!

..:: PPKLP ::..
